entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain mixed with snow. High 6. POP 60%
